:::{table}
:class: notitle

|             |                                                                          |
|-------------|--------------------------------------------------------------------------|
| `VAR`       |  variable name (or comma-seperated list of names) to assign each item to |
| `ITERABLE`  |  object to iterate over.                                                 |
| `BODY`      |  statements to execute where `VAR` will be used                          |

:::
